item.title: Witnessed someone throwing rubbish out of their moving car, 6th December

item.title: Pellerin rd/Shellgrove estate car park used regularly by non permit holders, 6th December
item.description:
Non permit holders/non payment for parking. I am a female unable to use Pellerin Road car park at any hour especially over the weekend due to non residents, not permit holders using residents car parking Please may I request parking enforcement
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pellerin Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
